snippet: The Devils sing the praises of their first-year coach, Peter DeBoer, but he had his detractors after three dismal seasons in Florida, including Panthers goalie Scott Clemmensen.
abstract: The Devils sing the praises of their first-year coach, Peter DeBoer, but he had his detractors after three dismal seasons in Florida, including Panthers goalie Scott Clemmensen.

headline.main: DeBoer: Popular With Devils, Less So With Panthers
